text:
[Verse]
Wake up and run
Chase the sun
Feel the fun
Day's begun

[Chorus]
We follow the sun
Together as one
On the run
Having fun

[Verse 2]
Bright sky above
Feel the love
Fly like a dove
Rise above

[Chorus]
We follow the sun
Together as one
On the run
Having fun

[Verse 3]
No time to waste
Life to taste
Make it great
It's our fate

[Bridge]
In the light we shine
Every day divine
Dance in line
Feeling fine
title: Follow the Sun
